# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Creates a subset of the column, given a range of elements.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript(slice: Range<Int>) -> MLDataColumn<Element> { get }
```

## Parameters

- **slice**: A range of integers indicating which elements to include in the new column.

## Return Value

A new column.

## Selecting elements to generate a column

- **subscript(_:)**: Creates a subset of the column, given a range expression of elements.
- **prefix(_:)**: Creates a subset of the column, given a number of initial elements.
- **suffix(_:)**: Creates a subset of the column, given a number of final elements.
